thread.title: BRIEF-Essence Ventures Announces Acquisition Of Essence Communications From Time

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Essence Ventures Announces Acquisition Of Essence Communications From Time

organizations.name: brief-essence ventures announces acquisition of essence communications from time jan

text:
Jan 3 (Reuters) - Essence Ventures Llc:
* ESSENCE VENTURES ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ESSENCE COMMUNICATIONS FROM TIME INC
* SAYS ‍TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED * SAYS EXECUTIVE TEAM OF ESSENCE WILL HAVE AN EQUITY STAKE IN TIME‘S ESSENCE COMMUNICATIONS BUSINESS
* SAYS ESSENCE PRESIDENT MICHELLE EBANKS WILL CONTINUE AT HELM OF COMPANY AND WILL ALSO JOIN ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
